jobDescription: Hello Partners,  I'm working on a Data Analyst position for my direct client in Washington, DC. Duration is 6 months. Below is the job description. Please let me know if you have any consultants available. I look forward to hear from you soon. Thanks! Must have experience: Digital marketing analyticsPosition: Data Analyst (Digital Marketing AnalyticsLocation: Washington, DCDuration: 6 monthsJob Description: 1) Marketing analytics, business analytics skill set:  a) multi-channel campaign design and cadence / frequency test  b) campaign tracking and in-flight optimization where applicable (i.e working w/ VML as digital contact point for them to implement the media buys)  c) cross channel reporting, insights and interpretation, prescriptive recommendations for optimization of next campaign cycle  d) market sizing and/or business opportunities  e) revenue projections by campaign, audience, channel Ability to manipulate datasets using SQL, SAS to execute audience selection and drive business insight. Ability to use excel, power user (i.e. pivot tables, macros) preferredAbility to transform insights to power point presentations. Client-facing role to present findings to clientsDigital marketing knowledge, familiar with digital analytics (site analytics is a plus)Agency experience- someone who has worked in cross functional, agile, environment.Hands-on experience with digital / big data platforms, e.g. cloud, liveramp, DMP is a bonus
